thread.title: Congress slams PM Modi, BJP Leaders Of Sheilding Lalit Modi
thread.title_full: Congress slams PM Modi, BJP Leaders Of Sheilding Lalit Modi

author: Tehelka Web Desk
title: Congress slams PM Modi, BJP Leaders Of Sheilding Lalit Modi
text: Randeep Surjewala , Congress Spokesperson Launching a fresh attack, Congress accuses BJP and PM Modi of shielding the former IPL chief Lalit Modi . “Prime Minister should also tell us when he will get Lalit Modi back into the country. We demand PM to give a statement on his ministers aiding Lalit Modi , and take a firm stand by sacking External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj and Rajasthan Chief Minister Vasundhara Raje ,” said Congress spokesperson Randeep Surjewala . Surjewala accused PM Modi for shielding Lalit Modi . He said, “Britain has a law that immigrants who has no passport document should be deported. But his ministers within his party have assisted Lalit Modi to maintain a fair distance from the law.” Citing the letter written by former Finance Minister Chidambaram his then counterpart in UK, Surjewala said, “External Affairs Ministry lied that (former EAM minister) P Chidambaram shared no correspondence he wrote to UK.” */
